blogPost.excerpt: Ready to hone your sales skills? For a limited time only, download our entire collection of sales resources—no cost, no email, no catch. Featuring exclusive content from CEOs, entrepreneurs, and sales pros, this is an absolute masterclass in all things sales.
blogPost.body: Ready to hone your sales skills? For a limited time only, download our entire collection of sales resources—no cost, no email, no catch. Featuring exclusive content from CEOs, entrepreneurs, and sales pros, this is an absolute masterclass in all things sales.
blogPost.title: Sales Resource Collection - The biggest assembly of sales templates, tools, and guides
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 准备好磨练你的销售技巧了吗？在有限的时间内，下载我们的全部销售资源集--无需费用、无需电子邮件、无需附加条件。其中包括来自CEO、企业家和销售专家的独家内容，这绝对是销售领域的大师级课程。
localize.tagline: 最大的销售模板、工具和指南的集合。

localize.description: 準備好磨練你的銷售技巧了嗎？在有限的時間內，下載我們的全部銷售資源集--無需費用、無需電子郵件、無需附加條件。其中包括來自CEO、企業家和銷售專家的獨家內容，這絕對是銷售領域的大師級課程。
localize.tagline: 最大的銷售模板、工具和指南的集合。

previous.excerpt: With Portal, let your clients login on your own website and give them one place for payments, messaging, file-sharing, eSignatures, intake forms, and more.
previous.title: Portal - The modern client portal

localize.description: 通过Portal，让您的客户在自己的网站上登录，并为他们提供一个地方进行支付、信息传递、文件共享、电子签名、接收表格等。
通過Portal，讓您的客戶在自己的網站上登錄，併爲他們提供一個地方進行支付、信息傳遞、文件共享、電子簽名、接收表格等。

next.excerpt: BCPRO.APP is a free research-based online tool that uses genetic factors to analyze a person’s risk of developing a severe case of COVID–19. ⠀ We score your 23andMe, Ancestry, or MyHeritage raw data, and turn the insights into a report in less than 1 minute.
next.title: BCPRO.APP - Kick COVID using your DNA data… before it kicks you

localize.description: BCPRO.APP是一款免费的研究型在线工具，它利用遗传因素分析一个人患COVID-19重症的风险。⠀我们对您的23andMe、Ancestry或MyHeritage原始数据进行打分，并在1分钟内将洞察力转化为报告。
localize.tagline: 用你的DNA数据踢掉COVID... 在它踢掉你之前。

localize.description: BCPRO.APP是一款免費的研究型在線工具，它利用遺傳因素分析一個人患COVID-19重症的風險。⠀我們對您的23andMe、Ancestry或MyHeritage原始數據進行打分，並在1分鐘內將洞察力轉化爲報告。
localize.tagline: 用你的DNA數據踢掉COVID... 在它踢掉你之前。
